subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Seattle will join Major League Soccer beginning in 2009. The yet-to-be named team will play at Qwest Field, home of the Seattle Seahawks. The expansion will make Seattle the league’s 15th club.
snippet: Seattle will join Major League Soccer beginning in 2009. The yet-to-be named team will play at Qwest Field, home of the Seattle Seahawks. The expansion will make Seattle the league’s 15th club.
